name: Webhook Idempotency Pattern
description: CRITICAL: Prevents duplicate webhook processing via cached responses and distributed locking. Supports InMemory, Redis, and PostgreSQL backends. Includes FastAPI middleware and decorators.
example_usage:
from library.patterns.webhook_idempotency import idempotent, RedisIdempotencyStore
store = RedisIdempotencyStore(redis_client)
@idempotent(store)
async def handle_webhook(request): ...
